alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:38PM CDT until June 23 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER...SOUTHEASTERN TOM GREEN AND SOUTHEASTERN IRION COUNTIES... At 737 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from San Angelo to near Christoval to 6 miles northwest of The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1828 And Ranch Road 915, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Goodfellow Air Force Base around 745 PM CDT. Christoval around 750 PM CDT. Veribest around 800 PM CDT. Wall around 805 PM CDT. Mereta around 820 PM CDT. Vancourt around 825 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Us- 67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
